text.0: swift runs this giver of delight even the stream of flowing juice.
text.1: swift runs this giver of delight.
text.2: the morning knows all precious things the goddess knows her grace to man.
text.3: swift runs this giver of delight.
text.4: we have accepted thousands from dhvasras and puruṣantis hands.
text.5: swift runs this giver of delight.
text.6: from whom we have accepted thus thousands and three times ten beside.
text.7: swift runs this giver of delight.
